text: Hello Guys, I'm planning in moving a wordpress site to HubSpot using hubBD. I have cars in the DB that uses a bunch of links to create a gallery. But my client wants to have the easy ability to add them as a bunch of images and not urls. Is there a way to create a Gallery Column in the DB? or another easy way? how would you do it?
It would be like the same example you showed in the partners day but what if the films had a gallery of images per each, how would you add that? <@U6GNQ7JBU> <@UA6LDL887> <@U87RV5L5V>

<@UCDEM8T63> I have requested a gallery column type in the <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> channel here: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1533314588000010> - Currently, you have to add a column for each image in the gallery since there isn't a way to add multiple images to a single column
alternatively, you may want to use the image gallery module or create a custom module using a repeater field (or field group) and add the gallery on the page level.
